snippet: Forty-eight hours after the latest cease-fire deal in South Sudan, a battle broke out on Monday between government troops and rebel fighters in which 29 combatants died, said a military spokesman.
lead_paragraph: Forty-eight hours after the latest cease-fire deal in South Sudan, a battle broke out on Monday between government troops and rebel fighters in which 29 combatants died, said a military spokesman.

headline.main: South Sudan: Cease-Fire Ends After 48 Hours
headline.print_headline: South Sudan: Cease-Fire Ends After 48 Hours
